name: Shadow_Bolt
display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack that can lower your target's attack rate and movement speed. This power can be used while in Dwarf form, although only at a reduced range. While in dwarf form, this power will inflict a stronger attack and movement debuff, in addition to taunt its target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Ebon_Eye
display_help: You can emit a beam of dark energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Negative Energy damage. Ebon Eye can also slow your target's attack rate and movement speed. This power can be used while in Nova form at an increased range and with higher damage but slower recharge. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Gravimetric_Snare
display_help: You can hurl Gravimetric fibers to Snare your foes. Gravimetric Snare can Immobilize a single target and crush them. The target's attack rate and movement speed are also slowed, even if they resist the Immobilization effect. Damage: Moderate Damage over time, Recharge: Fast

name: Dark_Nova
display_help: Kheldians are masters of energy and matter. A Warshade can transform into a flying energy beast known as a Dark Nova. When you choose this power, you will have access to 4 very powerful ranged attacks that can only be used while in this form. You will not be able to use any other powers while in Dark Nova form. Dark Nova can fly, has an increased chance to hit and improved Endurance Recovery but has no defense. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Dark_Nova_Bolt
display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack that lowers your target's attack and movement speed. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Dark_Nova_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Dark Nova Bolt. Dark Nova Blast sends focused negative Nictus energy at a foe. This attack can knock down foes and will leave the targets' attack and movement speed slowed. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Dark_Nova_Emanation
display_help: Sends bolts of Nictus dark energy to multiple targets at once within a cone area in front of the caster. Deals moderate negative energy damage to each affected foe and reduces their attack rate and movement speed. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Moderate. Recharge: Slow

name: Dark_Nova_Detonation
display_help: You hurl a blast of Dark Matter that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. All affected targets' attack and movement speed are slowed. Some foes may be knocked down. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

name: Shadow_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Shadow Bolt. Shadow Blast sends focused negative Nictus energy at a foe. This attack can knock down foes and will leave the target's attack rate and movement speed slowed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Starless_Step
display_help: You can Teleport a single foe through a dark matter wormhole directly next to you. A successful hit must be made in order to Teleport the target, and some powerful foes cannot be Teleported. This power can be interrupted. Recharge: Slow

name: Sunless_Mire
display_help: Sunless Mire can drain the essence of all nearby foes, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe -Recharge, -SPD; Self +DMG, +To Hit

name: Dark_Matter_Detonation
display_help: You hurl a blast of Dark Matter that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. All affected targets' have their attack rate and movement speed slowed. Some foes may be knocked down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

name: Gravity_Well
display_help: Mastery over the forces of gravity and dark matter allows you to capture a single foe and crush them in a Gravity Well. The target is Held helpless, while he is crushed by the massive gravimetric forces. The target's attack rate and movement speed are also slowed, even if they resists the Hold effect. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Essence_Drain
display_help: You tap the primal forces of your Nictus power to create an Essence Draining conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to you. Foes drained in this manner have their attack rate and movement speed reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Gravitic_Emanation
display_help: Gravitic Emanation sends bolts of dark Nictus energy to multiple targets within a cone area in front of the caster. Gravitic Emanation deals only minor Negative Energy damage to each affected foe, but knocks them back, leaving them Disoriented and with reduced attack rate and movement speed. Damage: Minor. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DMG(Negative), Foe Disorient, Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

name: Unchain_Essence
display_help: The Warshade can release the energy of a defeated foe and cause a massive Negative Energy explosion that can devastate any remaining foes. This power can only be activated by targeting a defeated foe. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE Special), Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Disorient, Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

name: Dark_Extraction
display_help: Defeated foes are ripe for the picking. A Warshade can extract the essence from a defeated villain and infuse it with Nictus energy. The extracted energy is an echo of the target's life force, and although it is not sentient, the infused Nictus energy does give it a rudimentary spark of life. Eventually, the extracted entity will fade away into nothingness. Recharge: Long

name: Quasar
display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of Negative Energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Quasar deals massive damage to all nearby foes. Affected foes will be knocked down and their attack rate and movement speed will be slowed. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
